page.title: 12CLAYGATE FLOWERSHOW
page.content: The show was started by a group of friends in 1903 in a field in Claygate. It was not held during the two world wars. Nowadays, features include horticultural,domestic,craft,decorativ e,children's and pets' competitions held in marquees. There are also sports for children, a dog show, a tug of war held between village pubs, charity stalls, a fancy dress competition, displays of dancing,bands, refreshments, a beer tent, a trade tent, farm animals, a travelling fun fair and a cross-country run. A barn dance is held during the year.
